value:
Love is such a tricky thing. It can be
someone's critical weakness, just as it
can be their source of strength.

That man with Chrom is a Robin from
another world, right? They get along
so well, I'm almost jealous...

What do you think of my outfit?
Hmm... I wonder if Chrom would
share your opinion...

My tactical treatises contain nothing
about love. I suppose I'll have to fill in
the blanks myself...

Empathy, compassion, and gratitude
are our best weapons against the
forces of darkness and despair.

The Day of Devotion reminds us to
show our friends we care. That's why
$Nf sent me!

I've survived so many conflicts...
Through them, I've learned that love
can transcend any obstacle.

I hope that those closest to me
understand just how truly grateful
I am for them.

Perhaps I am over-complicating this.
Expressing love may not require such
an intricate strategy, after all...

I appreciate this token of your
affection. I will not let it go to waste.

My name is Robin, the tactician for
Chrom's Shepherds. I have a strategy
for livening up this Day of Devotion.

My mind was a blank slate when I
first met Chrom. I couldn't remember
anything, not even who I was.$k$pBecause of that, I didn't have any
goals, nor any drive to move forward.
All I had were my skills as a tactician.$k$pThankfully, I was welcomed in by
Chrom and the rest of the Shepherds.
They made me feel at home.$k$pThey taught me everything I know
about courage and hope, and for that
I am forever grateful.$k$pThey showed me the love that we all
share for our world...and the strength
required to shield it from harm.$k$pI think the greatest act of gratitude
I could express is sharing that joy
with everyone I meet.
はいっ
決めます！
きゃあっ
いけません…
Delivered with love.
I've put all my heart into this!
Please accept this.
Let's be together forever.
So much left to say...
*Chuckle*
I hear today is the Day of Devotion—the perfect chance to show how much we love the people who are always there for us.
Hm? Oh, you have a present for me? That's so sweet of you!
There are many I am grateful to, but even among them, Chrom is special.
Flowers! And they smell so lovely... I've been told flowers soothe the soul, and I tend to agree.
Would you mind waiting a moment? I need to figure out the optimal route for getting to every stall before the festival ends.
Showing our gratitude and being considerate of others... That's how we make a kinder, more peaceful world.
Here, this flower reminded me of you. I hope that we can continue to fight side by side, just like this.
Of course.
Love can be tricky...
Your joy is mine as well.
